scripts.lambda:functions: npx remotion lambda functions deploy --region us-east-1 --memory 2048 --timeout 120
scripts.lambda:site: npx remotion lambda sites create src/index.ts --region us-east-1 --site-name remotion-ensinalab
scripts.lambda:ls: npx remotion lambda functions ls --region us-east-1 && npx remotion lambda sites ls --region us-east-1
scripts.lambda:render: npx remotion lambda render HelloWorld output.mp4 --region us-east-1
